oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Briggs Bros. Paint Company, Nashville, Tennessee, circa 1969
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Mayor Briley is pictured shaking hands with a businessman at Briggs Bros. Paint Company, circa 1969. This successful business was located in East Nashville at 501 Woodland Street, a manufacturer and seller of paints and coating throughout the mid-South. The 1969 City Directory cites James E. Bates, President. Forms part of Record Group 3, Metro Davidson County Photographer. 1 negative, filmstrip : b & w.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Briley, Beverly, 1914-1980
